00064 int main()
00065 {
00066     try {
00067             struct timeval stimeo = { 1, 0 };
00068             struct sockaddr_un cun;
00069             socklen_t cunl;
00070             uint32_t i;
00071             int fd_new;
00072 
00073             ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
00074 
00075             setup();
00076 
00077             fds.add(sso, POLLIN | POLLERR | POLLNVAL );
00078             for( ;; ) {
00079                     if( fds.poll(-1) > 0 ) {
00080                             for( i=1; i < fds.cnt; i++ ) {
00081                                     if( ! fds[i].revents ) continue;
00082                                     if( fds[i].revents & POLLNVAL 
00083                                         || fds[i].revents & POLLHUP 
00084                                         || fds[i].revents & POLLERR
00085                                         || (fds[i].revents & POLLIN && child(fds[i].fd))) {
00086                                             close(fds[i].fd);
00087                                             fds.rm(fds[i].fd);
00088                                     }
00089                             }
00090                             if( fds.fds[0].revents & POLLIN ) {
00091                                     cunl = sizeof(cun);
00092                                     if( (fd_new=accept(sso, (struct sockaddr *)&cun, &cunl)) != -1 ) {
00093                                             if( setsockopt(fd_new, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO, 
00094                                                 & stimeo, sizeof(stimeo))
00095                                                 || setsockopt(fd_new, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,
00096                                                 & stimeo, sizeof(stimeo)) )
00097                                                     cerr << "setsockopt: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00098                                             fds.add(fd_new, POLLIN | POLLERR | POLLNVAL | POLLHUP );
00099                                     } else cerr<< "accept: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00100                             } else if( fds[0].revents ) {
00101                                     cerr<<"socket problem: "<< fds[0].revents << ": "<<strerror(errno)<<endl;
00102                                     return 1;
00103                             }
00104                     } else cerr<< "poll: " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00105             }
00106     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00107             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00108             return 1;
00109     } catch( ... ) {
00110             cerr<< "shit, unknown exception!!!"<<endl;
00111             return 2;
00112     }
00113     return 0;
00114 }
